Private
Employment
£170,350
Payment of £7,000 plus VAT expected for speaking
at an event at the Hotel Adlon Kempinski, Berlin
on 9 November 2016. Payer: Citywire, 87 Vauxhall
Walk, Lambeth SE11 5HJ. Hours (including travel
and preparation time): 12 hrs. Hotel accommodation
(1 night) and flights and taxis were also paid.
